pages.text: There are a few indicator symbols in the HUD that show the status of Techguns effects. Some can be toggled by $(l:tg_inventory_tab#buttons)button$(/l) or keybind.

pages.title: HUD & Button Symbols
pages.text: The symbols used in the Techguns HUD and for $(l:tg_inventory_tab#buttons)buttons$(/l) in the $(l:tg_inventory_tab)Techguns Inventory Tab$(/l).
